dynamic_elements.map_points_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?point ?pointLabel ?villeIdLabel ?lat ?long
WHERE
{
  ?point wdt:P31 wd:Q24354. #theatre
  ?point wdt:P131 ?villeId.
  ?point p:P625 ?statement.
  ?statement psv:P625 ?node.
  ?node wikibase:geoLatitude ?lat.
  ?node wikibase:geoLongitude ?long.
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". }
}
